itemInfo.itemDesc: Steel Taritas Shoes made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Shoes.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Steel
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards and Coal together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fine Hard Hide
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying dinosaur, lizard, or worm hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Mud Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Mud Crystals found near Glish Ruins.

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc: Steel Taritas Shoes made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Shoes.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Grade 1 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Ultimate Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc:
Steel Taritas Shoes with maximum potential.
Lighter than ordinary Ultimate Taritas shoes, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : All Taritas and Steel Taritas Shoes

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes
item.desc: Steel Taritas Shoes made by master blacksmith\nIt is lighter and more durable than normal one. It can also be used for durability restoration of normal Taritas Shoes.\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes of Iron Wall
item.desc:
Energy of iron wall is contained within this Steel Taritas Shoes
Lighter than ordinary Taritas Shoes of Iron Wall, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Shoes of Iron wall, Steel Taritas Shoes, Taritas Shoes

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes of Intimidation
item.desc:
Energy of intimidation is contained within this Steel Taritas Shoes
Lighter than ordinary Taritas Shoes of Duress, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Shoes of Duress, Steel Taritas Shoes, Taritas Shoes

item.name: Steel Taritas Shoes of Agility
item.desc:
Energy of agility is contained within this Steel Taritas Shoes
Lighter than ordinary Taritas Shoes of Agility, and more durable.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect
- Restore Max Durability : Steel Taritas Shoes of Agility, Steel Taritas Shoes, Taritas Shoes

item.name: Mud Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Mud Crystals found near Glish Ruins.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.
